summary: Use this API to ship orders (purchase labels)
description:
Use this API to ship orders (purchase labels). This API is region specific to the US. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Based on the package attributes, options listed below may differ from your shipping subscriptions. Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: List of order line item IDs.

children.description: Package length.  The length, width, and height must be passed together.
Package width.  The length, width, and height must be passed together.
Package height.  The length, width, and height must be passed together.
The unit of measurement for the package dimensions.  Available values: - CM - INCH
Specify the shipping service used.  If not specified, use the default service obtained from Get Eligible Shipping Service.
The numerical value of the package weight.
The unit of measurement for the package weight.  Available values: - GRAM - POUND

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: TikTok Shop order ID.
List of order line item IDs.
Package dimensions.
Package length.
Package width.
Package height.
The unit of measurement for the package dimensions.  Available values: - CM - INCH
The available shipping service's information.
Shipping service ID.
Shipping service name.
Estimated price for this service.
Currency of the price.
The minimum estimated duration required for package delivery.
The maximum estimated duration required for package delivery.
Shipping provider ID.
Shipping provider name.
Package ID.
Package weight.
The numerical value of the package weight.
The unit of measurement for the package weight.  Available values: - GRAM - POUND
The time when the product was created. Unix timestamp.
